definition: elderly man/father/father-in-law/neck feathers of a bird (old)

wine-lover's heart is not in the cup (idiom); a drinker not really interested in alcohol/having an ulterior motive/to have other things in mind/with an ax to grind/accomplishing something besides what one set out to do
pinyin: zui4 weng1 zhi1 yi4 bu4 zai4 jiu3

sentences.english: Where does the Ulterior Motives of “Lady Class” Offered by Colleges and Universities lie?
sentences.chinese: 高校開設“淑女班”醉翁之意何在？

sentences.english: It's not the wine but your brain drunk yourself.
sentences.chinese: 醉翁之意不在酒，在乎心腦之間也。

sentences.english: Beautiful scenery but meal, elegance but drink, have ulterior motives, too wonderful for words.
sentences.chinese: 秀色可餐，優雅可飲，醉翁之意，妙不可言。

sentences.english: When in Chuzhou, since the number tippler.
I guessed when he asked for an interview that Smith had an axe to grind.
sentences.chinese: 史密斯要求會見，我想他是醉翁之意不在酒。

sentences.english: The concepts of agile require transformation that is not restricted to the development team.
sentences.chinese: 敏捷理念的醉翁之意本就不止於開發團隊的變革。

definition: free of worldly concerns/above the fray/at peace with the world
Dongpo District of Meishan City 眉山市[Mei2 shan1 Shi4], Sichuan
Ouyang Xiu (1007-1072), Northern Song dynasty prose writer and historian
